title: Herbal Essences Conditioner, Eucalyptus + Potent Aloe, Scalp Balance 13.5 fl oz
author: Supermercados Selectos
description: Say hello to aloe! Nature's gentle care. Our Eucalyptus & Potent Aloe formula is infused with real aloe and leaves your hair feeling hydrated while also balancing your scalp. Our sulfate-free conditioner nourishes dry hair, leaving it silky soft with increased manageability, suppleness, and shine. It's made with real botanicals that are certified by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, a world-leading expert on plants. It's also pH-balanced, dermatologist-tested, and gentle enough to use every day. Feel good knowing that this formula is certified PETA Cruelty-Free and is packed in recycled plastic. Pair it up with Herbal Essences bio:renew Eucalyptus + Potent Aloe Sulfate-Free Shampoo for the perfect sulfate-free shampoo and conditioner pairing. Discover the wonders of nature—selected by experts, blended by us.
